Package emissary.test.core.junit5

Class UnitTest

java.lang.Object
emissary.test.core.junit5.UnitTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
AgentPoolTest, DateTimeFormatParserTest, ExtractionTest, FunctionalTest, IdentificationTest, InputSessionTest, MetadataDictionaryTest, PayloadUtilTest, RequestUtilTest, RollableTest
@ExtendWith(DumpFailuresWatcher.class) public abstract class UnitTest extends Object
Base class of all the unit tests

    • configure

      protected void configure()
      Configure the test stuff

      Beware though, if you use @BeforeClass this will not have had a chance to run. So you can do something like UnitTest.setupSystemProperties(); in the @BeforeClass. See FlexibleDateTimeParserTest for an example

      protected void setConfig(String configPath, boolean pkg) throws EmissaryException
      Set up configuration
      Parameters:
      configPath - The path to use for config.dir, or null if the value should not be changed.
